brookes.name: Problem Solving and Programming
brookes.text: This module was an introduction to programming based in Python. I found this module to be remarkably easy because I already had 7 years of experince using the language by this time.

brookes.name: Basic Communications and PC Networking
brookes.text: Networking was a very content-heavy module that covered the TCP/IP and OSI models in great detail. We did a small amount of physcial networking, but mostly using the Packet Tracer simulation software.
